Class DukesVerticle

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.core.AbstractVerticle
      • io.vertx.rxjava.core.AbstractVerticle
        • org.rcdukes.common.DukesVerticle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.vertx.core.Verticle

    public abstract class DukesVerticle
extends io.vertx.rxjava.core.AbstractVerticle
    Author:
    wf unifies handling of AbstracVerticles in rc-dukes project uses the rxjava version of AbstractVerticles

        public io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject toJsonObject(String... nameValues)
        convert the given list of name Value to a JsonObject
        Parameters:
        nameValues - - needs to be an even number of arguments otherwise an IllegalArgumentException runtime exception is thrown
        Returns:
        - the JsonObject create from the nameValues by putting name,value into the object in a pairwise fassion
